3B001 Equipment for the manufacturing of semiconductor devices, materials, or related equipment, as follows (see List of Items Controlled) and “specially designed” “components” and “accessories” therefor.
Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment, as follows:

structure.heading: Equipment designed for deposition of a film, containing silicon and carbon, and having a dielectric constant (k) of less than 5.3, into lateral openings having widths of less than 70 nm and aspect ratios greater than 5:1 (depth: width) and a feature-to-feature pitch of less than 100 nm, while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 400 °C and less than 650 °C, and having all of the following:
structure.label: 3B001.d.16 – Equipment designed for deposition of a film, containing silicon and carbon, and having a dielectric constant (k) of less than 5.3, into lateral openings having widths of less than 70 nm and aspect ratios greater than 5:1 (depth: width) and a feature-to-feature pitch of less than 100 nm, while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 400 °C and less than 650 °C, and having all of the following:

children.heading: Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;
children.label: 3B001.d.16.a – Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;

content.html: d.16.a. Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;
content.text: d.16.a. Boat designed to hold multiple vertically stacked wafers;

children.heading: Two or more vertical injectors; and
children.label: 3B001.d.16.b – Two or more vertical injectors; and

content.html: d.16.b. Two or more vertical injectors; and
content.text: d.16.b. Two or more vertical injectors; and

children.heading: A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source;
children.label: 3B001.d.16.c – A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source;

content.html: d.16.c. A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source;
content.text: d.16.c. A silicon source and propene are introduced to a different injector than a nitrogen source or an oxygen source;
